content.prompt: If the supply of fish increases, there will be

choices.label: an increase in the demand for chicken, a substitute good
an increase in the demand for fish
an increase in the price of fish tacos
a decrease in the price of fish
a decrease in the supply of potatoes, a complementary good

topic.text: 2.7: Market Disequilibrium and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
